title: Pixel 4 bluetooth disconnects on power save mode
content: As long as I can remember, my Pixel 4 XL disconnects from my car's Bluetooth once I turn the screen on if my phone is in power save mode. Not when I turn the screen off, but once I turn it off. I never had this issue on my Pixel 2 XL. The issue happens only when in battery save mode and at any battery level. I factory reset my phone two months ago and that did not solve the issue. I also went and allowed no battery restrictions on the system Bluetooth app. It is really starting to drive me nuts because sometimes it just does not reconnect to my Bluetooth.
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 4 XL
